topicSummary: Meniere's disease is a disorder affecting the inner ear whichÂ can affect balance and hearing.

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Meniere's disease: Summary

latestChanges.title: Reviewed
latestChanges.body: A literature search was conducted in August 2017 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key RCTs published since the last revision of this topic. No major changes to recommendations have been made, but diagnostic criteria have been updated and the lower age range of the topic has been changed to 18 years. The topic has undergone minor structural changes.
